header.title: Language policy for the Divvun project

section.title: Overview of the language policy of the documentation
section.p: The project has its own language policy, which decides what information will be made available in what languages.

dl.dd: Northern Sámi, Lule Sámi, Finnish, Norwegian and Englishk
in the same language as the tool, in the majority language of the country where the language is used, and in English

section.p: We hope that this language policy for the project documentation will give inforation in a relevant language for all users and persons otherwise interested.
